summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 6, University Park Addition, being the alley between 15th Avenue Northeast and 16th Avenue Northeast, from East 50th Street to East 52nd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 89562 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
